channel.title: Server online?
channel.description: I have no clue now.. I had portfowarded, No ip duc, Change 127.0.01 or 0.0.0.0 to my no-ip. Dont know what else i gotta do. Some tips or helps pleasE? And im doing mine at rswebclients which says its offline -.-

item.title: Server online?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“webclientmaker, post:10, topic:518009”][quote author=xXSh0ckXx link=topic=636271.msg4289979#msg4289979 date=1367065133]

you can check if your port is open by going to

http://www.canyouseeme.org/ and put in the port you are using
and no-ip sucks you should use the ip on www.ipchicken.com its your ip but in american style that never changes

Lmfao no-ip is the most used website to host…
[/quote] Also floods the ip and stops working sometimes unless they have fixed this thats why i stopped using it and got told to use ipchicken instead[/quote]
My server has been online for 2 months without an issue caused by No-IP.

Read full topic

item.title: Server online?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“webclientmaker, post:7, topic:518009”]you can check if your port is open by going to

http://www.canyouseeme.org/ and put in the port you are using
and no-ip sucks you should use the ip on www.ipchicken.com its your ip but in american style that never changes[/quote]
Okay let me help you with this:
No-IP does not suck, you just are ignorant. No-IP is an IP MASKING service.
You need to have the server on (or something broadcasting) on a given port (this case, 43594) for canyouseeme to actually do anything.
ipchicken? Why use a third party site that could potentially track your IP address and use it for other purposes. You could just type “What is my IP” on google. and it will tell you.

xXSh0ckXx:

Lmfao no-ip is the most used website to host…

You need to be in depth when you’re trying to “correct” people.

Read full topic

item.title: Server online?
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

After you’ve done that make sure that you have the following things :

  • You set your client ip to 127.0.0.1 (so you can play)
  • You set your client ip to your no-ip (so other players can join playing)

Read full topic
